description:
YOUR BRAND IS NOT YOUR LOGO, IT IS NOT YOUR WEBSITE AND IT IS NOT UNDER YOUR CONTROL.

Welcome to Branding in 60 Minutes. This short but concise course is designed to give you a no-nonsense approach to designing and building a brand either from scratch, or waking you up to the flaws in your current brand.

This is an interactive course, there's no waffle and this is only for students who want to achieve a solid brand strategy by the end of it. If that sounds like you, then I look forward to seeing you inside.

Each concept we introduce is backed up by real-world examples, and then followed by an interactive exercise to help you get your brand on the same track as the successful global companies and organisations.
title: Branding in 60 minutes
